pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This library provides a typeclass with instances for types defined in \"base\". Instances for other types are expected to be defined in other libraries. Such libraries should be listed under <http://hackage.haskell.org/packages/#cat:Conversion the Conversion category>. So far the following are known:
* <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/conversion-bytestring "conversion-bytestring">
* <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/conversion-text "conversion-text">
* <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/conversion-case-insensitive "conversion-case-insensitive">
